languages.text: "Верьте или нет, но я видел такие миры. Обычно колонии на них долго не протягивают, так что не поддержу вашу гипотезу".
"Believe it or not, I have seen worlds like that. Colonies do not tend to last very long on them, so I cannot second your hypothesis."
languages.original_text: "Верьте или нет, но я видел такие миры. Обычно колонии на них долго не протягивают, так что не поддержу вашу гипотезу".

traits.locale_text: "Believe it or not, I have seen worlds like that. Colonies do not tend to last very long on them, so I cannot second your hypothesis."
"Believe it or not, I have seen worlds like that. Colonies do not tend to last very long on them, so I cannot second your hypothesis."
"Believe it or not, I have seen worlds like that. Colonies do not tend to last very long on them, so I cannot second your hypothesis."
"Believe it or not, I have seen worlds like that. Colonies do not tend to last very long on them, so I cannot second your hypothesis."
"Believe it or not, I have seen worlds like that. Colonies do not tend to last very long on them, so I cannot second your hypothesis."
"Believe it or not, I have seen worlds like that. Colonies do not tend to last very long on them, so I cannot second your hypothesis."

languages.text: "Ob Ihr es glaubt oder nicht, ich habe solche Welten schon gesehen. Kolonien haben auf ihnen meistens nicht lange Bestand, ich kann Eure Hypothese also nicht unterschreiben."
languages.original_text: "Believe it or not, I have seen worlds like that. Colonies do not tend to last very long on them, so I cannot second your hypothesis."

traits.locale_text: "Ob Ihr es glaubt oder nicht, ich habe solche Welten schon gesehen. Kolonien haben auf ihnen meistens nicht lange Bestand, ich kann Eure Hypothese also nicht unterschreiben."

languages.text: « Croyez-le ou non, j'ai déjà vu des mondes de ce genre. Cependant, il est rare que les colonies y subsistent bien longtemps, ce qui m'empêche d'abonder dans votre sens. »
languages.original_text: "Believe it or not, I have seen worlds like that. Colonies do not tend to last very long on them, so I cannot second your hypothesis."

traits.locale_text: « Croyez-le ou non, j'ai déjà vu des mondes de ce genre. Cependant, il est rare que les colonies y subsistent bien longtemps, ce qui m'empêche d'abonder dans votre sens. »

languages.text: 「信じられないかもしれませんが、私はそういう世界を実際に見たことがあります。ですが、そういった星ではコロニーはあまり長続きしません。ですから、あなたの仮説には同意できません」
languages.original_text: "Believe it or not, I have seen worlds like that. Colonies do not tend to last very long on them, so I cannot second your hypothesis."

traits.locale_text: 「信じられないかもしれませんが、私はそういう世界を実際に見たことがあります。ですが、そういった星ではコロニーはあまり長続きしません。ですから、あなたの仮説には同意できません」

languages.text: «Lo crea o no, he visto casos como el que describe. Las colonias en mundos así no suelen durar mucho, así que debo discrepar de su hipótesis».
languages.original_text: "Believe it or not, I have seen worlds like that. Colonies do not tend to last very long on them, so I cannot second your hypothesis."

traits.locale_text: «Lo crea o no, he visto casos como el que describe. Las colonias en mundos así no suelen durar mucho, así que debo discrepar de su hipótesis».

languages.text: “信不信由你，你说的那种世界我亲眼见过。在那样的行星上，殖民地往往无法存续很长时间，因此我无法支持你的假设。”
languages.original_text: "Believe it or not, I have seen worlds like that. Colonies do not tend to last very long on them, so I cannot second your hypothesis."

traits.locale_text: “信不信由你，你说的那种世界我亲眼见过。在那样的行星上，殖民地往往无法存续很长时间，因此我无法支持你的假设。”

languages.text: "İnanın bana, böylesine çok rastladım. Böyle dünyalarda kolonilerin ömrü çok uzun değildir, bu nedenle ne yazık ki varsayımınıza katılmıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Believe it or not, I have seen worlds like that. Colonies do not tend to last very long on them, so I cannot second your hypothesis."

traits.locale_text: "İnanın bana, böylesine çok rastladım. Böyle dünyalarda kolonilerin ömrü çok uzun değildir, bu nedenle ne yazık ki varsayımınıza katılmıyorum."
